trans-unit.source: Identify differences with Change Tracking
trans-unit.target: Identify differences with Change Tracking

trans-unit.source: Use the Configuration Change Tracking solution in Microsoft Azure Operational Insights to help you easily identify software and Windows Services changes that occur in your environment
trans-unit.target: Use the Configuration Change Tracking solution in Microsoft Azure Operational Insights to help you easily identify software and Windows Services changes that occur in your environment

trans-unit.source: Identify differences with Change Tracking
trans-unit.target: Identify differences with Change Tracking

trans-unit.source: You can use the Configuration Change Tracking solution in Microsoft Azure Operational Insights to help you easily identify software and Windows Services changes that occur in your environment — identifying these configuration changes can help you pinpoint operational issues.
trans-unit.target: You can use the Configuration Change Tracking solution in Microsoft Azure Operational Insights to help you easily identify software and Windows Services changes that occur in your environment — identifying these configuration changes can help you pinpoint operational issues.

trans-unit.source: You install the solution to update the Operations Manager agent and base configuration module for Operational Insights.
trans-unit.target: You install the solution to update the Operations Manager agent and base configuration module for Operational Insights.

trans-unit.source: Changes to installed software and Windows services on the monitored servers are read and then the data is sent to the Operational Insights service in the cloud for processing.
trans-unit.target: Changes to installed software and Windows services on the monitored servers are read and then the data is sent to the Operational Insights service in the cloud for processing.

trans-unit.source: Logic is applied to the received data and the cloud service records the data.
trans-unit.target: Logic is applied to the received data and the cloud service records the data.

trans-unit.source: When changes are found, servers with changes are shown in the Change Tracking dashboard.
trans-unit.target: When changes are found, servers with changes are shown in the Change Tracking dashboard.

trans-unit.source: By using the information on the Change Tracking dashboard, you can easily see the changes that were made in your server infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: By using the information on the Change Tracking dashboard, you can easily see the changes that were made in your server infrastructure.

trans-unit.source: Use Change Tracking
trans-unit.target: Use Change Tracking

trans-unit.source: Before you can use Change Tracking in Operational Insights, you must have the solution installed.
trans-unit.target: Before you can use Change Tracking in Operational Insights, you must have the solution installed.

trans-unit.source: To read more about installing solution, see [Use the Solution Gallery to add or remove solutions](operational-insights-setup-workspace.md).
trans-unit.target: To read more about installing solution, see [Use the Solution Gallery to add or remove solutions](operational-insights-setup-workspace.md).

trans-unit.source: After it is installed, you can view the summary of changes for your monitored servers by using the **Change Tracking** tile on the **Overview** page in Operational Insights.
trans-unit.target: After it is installed, you can view the summary of changes for your monitored servers by using the **Change Tracking** tile on the **Overview** page in Operational Insights.

trans-unit.source: image of Change Tracking tile
trans-unit.target: image of Change Tracking tile

trans-unit.source: You can view changes to your infrastructure and then drill-into details for the following categories:
trans-unit.target: You can view changes to your infrastructure and then drill-into details for the following categories:

trans-unit.source: Changes by configuration type for software and Windows services
trans-unit.target: Changes by configuration type for software and Windows services

trans-unit.source: Software changes to applications and updates for individual servers
trans-unit.target: Software changes to applications and updates for individual servers

trans-unit.source: Total number of software changes for each application
trans-unit.target: Total number of software changes for each application

trans-unit.source: Windows service changes for individual servers
trans-unit.target: Windows service changes for individual servers

trans-unit.source: image of Change Tracking dashboard
trans-unit.target: image of Change Tracking dashboard

trans-unit.source: image of Change Tracking dashboard
trans-unit.target: image of Change Tracking dashboard

trans-unit.source: To view changes for any change type
trans-unit.target: To view changes for any change type

trans-unit.source: On the **Overview** page, click the **Change Tracking** tile.
trans-unit.target: On the **Overview** page, click the **Change Tracking** tile.

trans-unit.source: On the **Change Tracking** dashboard, review the summary information in one of the change type blades and then click one to view detailed information about it in the **log search** page.
trans-unit.target: On the **Change Tracking** dashboard, review the summary information in one of the change type blades and then click one to view detailed information about it in the **log search** page.

trans-unit.source: On any of the log search pages, you can view results by time, detailed results, and your log search history.
trans-unit.target: On any of the log search pages, you can view results by time, detailed results, and your log search history.

trans-unit.source: You can also filter by facets to narrow the results.
trans-unit.target: You can also filter by facets to narrow the results.
